name: Validate date of birth entry with day, month, and year
scenarioId: DateofBirth:Validate date of birth entry with day, month, and year
methodName: Validate date of birth entry with day, month, and year

testSteps.description: 1: Validate date of birth entry with day, month, and year ({day=32, month=11, year=1980, output=DOB Invalid})

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions
When I enter my date of birth as "32" "11" "1980"
Then I should see "DOB Invalid"
